Aug. 2, 2014 D National Eisteddfod of Wales (Second Section)
National Eisteddfod of Wales (Second Section) 20 Entertainments Contest National Eisteddfod of Wales national-eisteddfod-wales-second-section
Festival Fields, Millennium Coastal Park, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire Own choice for no longer than 15 minutes and with a minimum of three items.
Prizes: 1. Cwpan Ivor Jarvis to be held for a year and £400 (Ymddiriedolaeth James Pantyfedwen) 2. £300 (Rhoddedig gan y teulu er cof am Huw Morris, Brynaman) 3. £200 (Contractwyr R.T. Bontfaen a Capel Hendre)
Sponsored by TAD Builders Ltd.
